title: Update popup text
body: Resolves #71

title: Add a history page
body:
Resolves #62 

* Removed some useless debug impl
* 4th and 5th options on J press can now be reset on empty input
* Home table scrolling is now done with offset to the selected index remains near the middle of the screen, always
* Fixed search tx not working properly on transfer tx type when either from or to methods are empty
* Add, edit, delete, search tx and tx position swap now records the activity 
* Datetime when fetching tx is now more accurate, fixing a bug of giving an extra row
* History UI page

title: Backup path
body:
Resolves #64 

- New input option on J press to take one or more paths
- If set, on quit tries to copy the most latest db to all the backup paths

title: Show a new info status when switching to normal tx mode
body:
Resolves #59 

* Modified edit tx status message
* New normal tx status message shown when switching to add tx tab

title: Allow switching position of a tx
body:
Resolves #58 

* Txs can now be moved using ',' '.' if on the same date
* Removed unnecessary cloning

title: Fix negative balance not loading
body:
Resolves #56 

* Negative balance is now loaded properly
* Number animation is now more precise and does not show unnecessary number changes

title: Add a info status on tx edit
body: Resolves #52

title: Add number animation
body: Resolves #51

title: Update test coverage
body: Resolves #41

title: Dependency updates
body: - Update multiple dependencies versions

title: Add the option to change file data location
body:
Resolves #45 

- On 'J' press there is now an option to change the location where app data is saved

title: Improve path handling
body:
- Updated how the app works with path. Went from str to PathBuf 
- Added support for kgx terminal

title: Show detailed Income expense info on the home page
body:
Resolves #42 

* method based income/expense data beside the total income and expense column
* Some clippy fixes

title: Added edit and deleting function on search page directly
body: Resolves #32

title: Added searching by date, month, year
body:
**What changed:**

- Fixed summary nothing being selected after sorting
- Moved summary sorting to 'X'
- Search new key press on 'X' for cycling date type
- Search page no longer auto-fills the date field
- Update verifier based on date type
- Update value stepper based on date type

Resolves #25

title: Fix db query
body:
- Fixed search query matching partial tag

Resolves #35

title: Update logo to make it round, small and transparent
Add NetBSD
body:
Hi,

I've just packaged `rex` and merged it into pkgsrc main branch.
For your reference, here's the commit message, http://mail-index.netbsd.org/pkgsrc-changes/2023/07/02/msg277964.html

The package should show-up on the online search database soon, https://pkgsrc.se

Regards

title: Fixed autofiller not working on fresh installation
Added deletion popup
body:
Resolves #24

- Added a popup when trying to delete tx
- Now after deleting a tx, it no longer goes back to the Month selection. Instead, it selects the previous tx if available

title: Add tx searching option
body:
Resolves #14

- Turned field stepping into a trait for testing
- Fixed a bug on tags step down
- Reduced code by half for stepping value
- The transfer page has been merged with Add Tx page
- Added tx searching
- Pressing Enter on Summary will open the Search page + search the selected tag
- Details field now also has autofill
- Search field support for > < >= <= on amount field
- Added a Search page help
- Fixed error message on delete failed

title: Added summary sorting on S press
Added tab completion on certain fields
body:
This pr adds

- Tab completion on
  - Tags fields
  - Tx method fields
- Improves matching with normalized_levenshtein 
- Improves tag verifier with duplicate remover
- Updated tests

title: Switch to ratatui
body: Resolves #19

title: Added rename and reposition for transactions methods
body:
Added new methods for taking user input for

- rename a transaction method
- reposition transaction methods

Along with these, 

- updated output handling, wordings and reduced repetition 
- Update tests
- Update popup now shows GitHub release notes

title: Transfer fix
body: Fix transaction tx issue. Resolves #12

title: Help text updates and preparing for crates release
Multi update
body:
**Updated so far**: 

- naming
- folder structure
- interface function calling
- dependencies
- initial UI rendering and code readability
- Popup function handling
- checking tx_method type with less code
- fix calculation in the amount checking
- moved lib.rs data to initializer with better logic
- removed unnecessary trait
- better error handling
- reduce repetition
- merged tx_data, transfer_data struct
- New month, year and mode selection widgets on chart and summary ui
- chart widget hiding
- chart animation
- Input fields cursor moving with arrow keys
- Chart now starts as if balance already existed instead of going from 0 
- Added arrow up/down handling for date, tx_method, tags, tx type
- Update balance_all column type to REAL + migration on start
- Simple tags formatting
- removed unnecessary db conn
- Added supported years to 2037
- Updated balance db to REAL from TEXT for future
- New db migration
- Update color scheme
- reduce chart data loading
- help text now with Bold
- Comments
- More text bolding
- 5 second timer thingy

title: Upgrade
body:
Added:

- Tags for each tx
- Summary page with tags
- Fixed data location
- Auto db migration for the tags field

Fixed:

- Not maintaining tx method serial when creating initial db/adding new tx methods
- Unnecessary text on chart ui

title: Added ability to cargo install
body: you can `cargo install https://github.com/WaffleMixer/Rex.git` with these changes

title: Multiple Updates
body:
Added:
- Transfer balance between tx methods
- Yearly chart of daily balance changes
- Simple calculation on the amount field
- Deleting transfer tx
- More tests

Fixed:
- Bad error.txt for auto console opening when using binary
- f32 bug
- Wrong balance pushes to DB

Other:
- Cleaner popup functions
- Comments
- Moved key press track to separate files
- Editing transaction now maintains the ID number so the tx order can remain the same
